    • Method Detail

      • placeAt

        public Placeable placeAt​(int x,
                         int y)
        Sets the coordinates of a Placeable by defining the upper left corner x and y values. Returns a Placeable as part of the Fluent Interface. If chaining this method at initialization, place it after all subclass chain methods.
        Parameters:
        x - upper left corner x coordinate of the Placeable
        y - upper left corner y coordinate of the Placeable
        Returns:
        an instance of this with updated x and y

      • placeAtCenter

        public Placeable placeAtCenter​(int x,
                               int y)
        Sets the coordinates of a Placeable by defining the center x and y values. Returns a Placeable as part of the Fluent Interface. If chaining this method at initialization, place it after all subclass chain methods.
        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate of the Placeable
        y - center y coordinate of the Placeable
        Returns:
        an instance of this with updated x and y

      • draw

        public void draw​()
        Standard method to draw an image to a screen. Should be overridden in subclasses.

      • defaultDraw

        protected void defaultDraw​()
        Default draw method. Should only be called in subclasses.

      • getFocus

        public void getFocus​()
        Obtain focus for this component. Should not be called by user under normal circumstances.

      • hasFocus

        public boolean hasFocus​()
        Check if this component has focus. Should not be called by the user under normal circumstances.
        Returns:
        true if this component has focus

      • setFocus

        public Placeable setFocus​(boolean focus)
        Enables or disables focus system for this component. Returns a Placeable as part of the Fluent Interface. If chaining this method at initialization, place it after all subclass chain methods.
        Parameters:
        focus - true if the focus system will be enabled for this component
        Returns:
        updated instance of this component
